text: a two-day teachers training program facilitated by the president the Senate Senator Gil aquabio has been concluded in AUM State the training which took place from Wednesday to Thursday at aodm local government area of aquum focused on information and communication technology and murder agricultural practices our correspondent Emmanuel sales has details it was a two-day intensive training for teachers in aquam States as educators gathered at the c local government area to upgrade their skills in information and communication technology and modern agricultural practices the training aimed to empower teachers with the necessary skills to integrate technology into agricultural practices thereby enhancing both teaching methods and productivity some participants who engaged in interactive sessions covering topics such as digital farming techniques the use of mobile applications for farm management and strategies for marketing agricultural products online said the training has exposed them to new possibilities in teaching agriculture I've achieved so many things in this training that I came for personally it is not only using chalk to teach in the classroom we are also asked to use our hands in doing things like farming trading personally I'm in love with farming so with those skill I will be able to advance more apart from the theorical part we are asked as a teacher we have to do the the Practical because of things have changed it's not only about the theory we have to go into the Practical aspect of it so now the Senate President throughout the small scale and medium Enterprises agency decided to train teachers to have other skills they will be used in ending their livings it's very interesting because they talk about communication how to make use our phone so that we will not be du by some criminal out there they tell us about how to to make use of a um computer phone to avoid problems on your password or transfer when you want to transfer money to someone you have to be careful because if you do mistake give your code to someone they may use it to Deb you others admitted that the training has empowered them with Innovative tools and technique to integrate technology into marketing Of Agricultural Product I'm very very happy I want to appreciate his Excellency for for the love that he has for the people ofia for sending this kind of training to us we have not been seen such but through our Senate President we saw all these thing may God bless him the training is very very interesting I am very happy about this program and I even thank God for those people that have made provision for this program to to lift up our knowledge on this most especially on this computer training so I am very very happy about and I pray that God should continue to give the organizer knowledge and interest on the teachers in particular in aquam States also speaking the facilitators encouraged the participants to share their knowledge with peers and Implement Innovative practices in their schools and communities especially on information and communication technology ICT and modern agricultural practice okay basically the event is just to equip most importantly teachers and of course teachers are the very key part of every child who is going to school you know child's life and basically they to equip them with the right information and today is about the ICT training and so we have teachers we have um who have come who have you know come together to ensure that they have the right informations right information rather when it comes to teaching the students in very um institution whether primary or secondary school SM is here to coordinate it that is part of what we are staff of sman are here to do like myself I'm to monitor the program if it goes with the rules with with the guideline guideline rules because for of our program there's a guideline with Renewed Energy and a wealth of knowledge the teachers left the training ready to inspire the Next Generation in modern agricultural engagements Emmanuel Silas adbn news
